ada shri lankawe wesena mulpele chithra shilpiyaku wana jayasiri semage bauddha chithra kalawa gana mana danumak athi ayeki, bahutharayak sithuwamhi ‘bauddha muhunuwarak’ athi ‘kalasuri’ jayasiri semage athin nirmanaya wana wiharayak shri lankawe athnam, bauddha eeka pudgala chithra pradarshanayaka rasawindimak kala haki tharamata pathwenawa no anumana yi.boralasgamuwa diwulpitiye shri maha bodhirajarama purana wiharayehi mulumaninma bauddha sithuwam nirmanaya kirime karyaya me dinawala ‘kalasuri’ jayasiri semage wisin karagena yamin pawathi.
